comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > Spotify player gets stuck on ads sometimes on web player with AdGuard enabled - no songs, nothing, not even ad plays. Only solution is to refresh the browser and replay the playlist. Trying to change playlist doesn't work either, completely stuck playerand now playing view. While with AdGuard disabled, ads load normally and player works as intended. One important thing: It happens after 2-3 times ads are skipped. e.g I open player, play a playlist, ads come normally due course, gets skipped twice or even thrice, songs playing uninterrupted, after that it gets stuck on ad and nothing plays. Like spotify detects adblocker is on after 2-3 skips and blocks plays (guess). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/83mi74u948w0g4kgws88k0sg8g8k4sg9pssix2rkdg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/2vay4knk3su8oowwo0ko4og4c880sgonwbv61x27r4.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.500.7 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880) Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > Spotify player gets stuck on ads sometimes on web player with AdGuard enabled - no songs, nothing, not even ad plays. Only solution is to refresh the browser and replay the playlist. Trying to change playlist doesn't work either, completely stuck playerand now playing view. While with AdGuard disabled, ads load normally and player works as intended. One important thing: It happens after 2-3 times ads are skipped. e.g I open player, play a playlist, ads come normally due course, gets skipped twice or even thrice, songs playing uninterrupted, after that it gets stuck on ad and nothing plays. Like spotify detects adblocker is on after 2-3 skips and blocks plays (guess). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/83mi74u948w0g4kgws88k0sg8g8k4sg9pssix2rkdg.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: dominos.by
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://dominos.by/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdominos.by%2F) ### Comment > Некорректно работает блокировка cookies. Что с включённым фильтром cookie-уведомлений, что без - картина одинаковая. Поп-ап про куки появляется на секунду и пропадает, при этом фон сайтов остаётся затемнённым и некликабельным. Пробовала блокировать вручную (через браузерный помощник), работает до перезагрузки страницы, потом опять. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: [False Negative]: add 34 phishing domains (trezosuiteapp[.]vercel[.]app, tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj[.]netlify[.]app, ...)
issue.body:
> [!IMPORTANT] > ## Executive Summary > > This report documents 34 domain(s) that have been identified as part of active phishing operations. These domains exhibit characteristics consistent with malicious infrastructure and pose an immediate security risk to internet users. The following 34 domain(s) have been analyzed and confirmed as participating in phishing campaign(s): ``` trezosuiteapp.vercel.app tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj.netlify.app ldgerlive.us trezorsuite.at home-leger-desktop.framer.ai get-trezzore.framer.ai get-treezr-suit-en.framer.media app-ledger-desktop.wasmer.app us-ledgredesktop.framer.ai ledgerapp.created.app ledgersso.created.app ledger-wallet.gitlab.io sute-trezr.created.app tronssan.github.io aomicwallet.github.io www.exodusl.com tfjg-rjgu-eeti-zjti-ordg-rfgj.netlify.app c066b573.smrta.pages.dev ad.exodus.build webapp.ghost.io eng-treezorsute.framer.ai started-trezo.framer.ai live-desktop-leidgr.framer.ai webassetsapp.ghost.io live-desktop-ledgr.framer.ai ledgercom.m-teach.com engsuites.ghost.io home-tzersuite.framer.ai suites-en.framer.ai hub-desktop-ladgr.framer.ai createwebsite.ghost.io guide-ledegr.framer.media appsuites.framer.ai apptreezorsuite.github.io ``` ## Threat Analysis ### Phishing Attack Details These domains are part of a phishing campaign targeting cryptocurrency companies and cryptocurrency holders/investors. Attackers may use fake login pages, fake Web3 wallet connection prompts, fake cryptocurrency exchange/swap interfaces, or modified/malicious software to steal cryptocurrency seed phrases/keys. ### Technical Details - No sophisticated cloaking detected. ### Detections & Targeted Brands - `trezosuiteapp.vercel.app` targets Trezor Wallet (trezor.io) - VirusTotal: **21 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/trezosuiteapp.vercel.app/detection - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=trezosuiteapp.vercel.app - `tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj.netlify.app` targets Trezor Wallet (trezor.io) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj.netlify.app/detection - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj.netlify.app - `ldgerlive.us` targets Ledger Live (ledger.com) - VirusTotal: **10 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/ldgerlive.us/detection - `trezorsuite.at` - VirusTotal: **20 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/trezorsuite.at/detection - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=trezorsuite.at - Listed on APVA - issue.title: [False Negative]: add 34 phishing domains (trezosuiteapp[.]vercel[.]app, tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj[.]netlify[.]app, ...)
issue.body:
> [!IMPORTANT] > ## Executive Summary > > This report documents 34 domain(s) that have been identified as part of active phishing operations. These domains exhibit characteristics consistent with malicious infrastructure and pose an immediate security risk to internet users. The following 34 domain(s) have been analyzed and confirmed as participating in phishing campaign(s): ``` trezosuiteapp.vercel.app tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj.netlify.app ldgerlive.us trezorsuite.at home-leger-desktop.framer.ai get-trezzore.framer.ai get-treezr-suit-en.framer.media app-ledger-desktop.wasmer.app us-ledgredesktop.framer.ai ledgerapp.created.app ledgersso.created.app ledger-wallet.gitlab.io sute-trezr.created.app tronssan.github.io aomicwallet.github.io www.exodusl.com tfjg-rjgu-eeti-zjti-ordg-rfgj.netlify.app c066b573.smrta.pages.dev ad.exodus.build webapp.ghost.io eng-treezorsute.framer.ai started-trezo.framer.ai live-desktop-leidgr.framer.ai webassetsapp.ghost.io live-desktop-ledgr.framer.ai ledgercom.m-teach.com engsuites.ghost.io home-tzersuite.framer.ai suites-en.framer.ai hub-desktop-ladgr.framer.ai createwebsite.ghost.io guide-ledegr.framer.media appsuites.framer.ai apptreezorsuite.github.io ``` ## Threat Analysis ### Phishing Attack Details These domains are part of a phishing campaign targeting cryptocurrency companies and cryptocurrency holders/investors. Attackers may use fake login pages, fake Web3 wallet connection prompts, fake cryptocurrency exchange/swap interfaces, or modified/malicious software to steal cryptocurrency seed phrases/keys. ### Technical Details - No sophisticated cloaking detected. ### Detections & Targeted Brands - `trezosuiteapp.vercel.app` targets Trezor Wallet (trezor.io) - VirusTotal: **21 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/trezosuiteapp.vercel.app/detection - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=trezosuiteapp.vercel.app - `tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj.netlify.app` targets Trezor Wallet (trezor.io) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/tfjg-rjgu-egji-zjgi-orjg-rngj.netlify.app/detection - comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://www.banco.scotiabankcolpatria.com/banca-virtual/login/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.banco.scotiabankcolpatria.com%2Fbanca-virtual%2Flogin%2F)
### Comment
> Al intentar ingresar a la app y la oficina virtual del banco Scotiabank Colpatria en Colombia (ahora Davibank) no es posible ingresar y arroja los errores que las pantallas que adjunté. Solo vuelva a funcionar cuando se deja el DNS automático de Android.
